page.title: 13SILFIELD PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Opened in 1876,this primary school with its{37 pupils aged 5-11}has 2 full- & 1 part-time teachers. A UEA student teaches 1 day a week & parents help twice a week with art,cooking & swimming.The part-time school welfare assistant/secretary takes music. The infants are taught in the large,old schoolroom & 8-11s in 1 of the mobiles - the other being used for assembly, library,drama & remedial work etc. School dinners are cooked on the prem- ises.In the old schoolhouse are the Head's office,a storeroom & the pupils cookery room.There is close contact & joint projects with other primary schools in the area.Chess club,book club & a computer rota exist & foot- ball is played weekly.{Local concern} {exists over the future of the school} in light of the recent County Council guidelines on school sizes.
